title: Riot's response to FWotD being shit
body:
Hey guys, we are gonna change it so you get some BE, but the amount of BE your going to get is worse then anything you could possibly get with the EXP in the first place.

Low roll - 810 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE= 3.55 XP, 175 XP = 49.29 BE

Next Roll - 900 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE = 3.2 XP, 175 XP = 54.6 BE

(there is another Roll in here, i just CBF with the maths)

High roll - 1260 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE = 2.28 XP, 175 XP = 76.75 BE

So your only better off now by .61 BE when you low roll, otherwise this change is a net loss.

But hey.... thanks riot for pretending you care.

replies.body: make it 175, give us a 1 for 1 trade off rito.
At least make it 75 BE, model it off the High roll, rather then the low roll.
the 810 roll averages at about 57 when traded for the 175xp at lv 46 anyway, still a loss
